short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your browsing experience by using personalized keyboard shortcuts for each website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Create personalized keyboard shortcuts for each website. Say goodbye to mouse clicks and streamline your browsing.

Custom Key Binding help you navigate frequently visited websites, such as the menus of your grocery store without having to click 5+ times.

Feature list:
- List all key bindings for the current tab and for all sites
- Create and delete your bindings
- Dark mode

Privacy: All of your data remains offline.

If you have any issues or suggestions, please visit our GitHub repository at https://github.com/peterlqs/Custom-Key-Binding-extension and submit an issue.
